DOC.HEADLINE: THREE MORE WORLD CUP GAMES SELL_OUT
DOC.TEXT: Three more World Cup soccer games sold_out Tuesday , increasing the number of sellouts for games in the first three rounds to 22.The Brazil vs . Russia match in San Francisco on June 20 , Bulgaria vs . Greece in Chicago on June 26 and a quarterfinal match in Boston on July 9 sold_out Tuesday . Tickets for the semifinals , third-place game and final are unavailable on an individual game basis .
